[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /std/basic/club_discuss.c

This file is for handling discussion items and clubs.

See also:
/obj/handlers/club_handler.c

Written by Pinkfish

Started April 21st 1999

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/player_handler.h, /include/am_time.h and /include/clubs.h

Method index

add_club_commands(object)
add_elected_commands(object)
This method adds the elected club specific commands to the player.
discussion_item(int, string)
This method returns information on the specified discussion item.
discussion_item_list(string)
This method will return the listing of discussion items as a nice string.
do_archive(int)
This method prints out the specific archive in more detail.
do_list_archives()
This method prints out the archives.
do_nominate(int, string)
A special entry point for nominating people to discussion items, this only works with the nomination discussion item.
do_withdraw(int)
A special entry point for withdrawing from a nominated discussion item, this only works with the nomination discussion item.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
discussion_item
string discussion_item(int id,
string player)
This method returns information on the specified discussion item.

Parameters:
id - the id of the discussion item to get information on
player - the player retreiving the information
Returns:
a string which is the information on the discussion item
discussion_item_list
string discussion_item_list(string player)
This method will return the listing of discussion items as a nice string.

Parameters:
player - the player who is doing the listing
Returns:
the discussion items as a listing
do_archive
int do_archive(int num)
This method prints out the specific archive in more detail.

Parameters:
num - the number of the archive to print out
Returns:
1 on success, 0 on failure
do_list_archives
int do_list_archives()
This method prints out the archives.

Returns:
1 on success, 0 on failure
do_nominate
int do_nominate(int id,
string person)
A special entry point for nominating people to discussion items, this only works with the nomination discussion item.

Parameters:
id - the id of the discussion item
person - the person to nominate
Returns:
1 for success, 0 for failure
do_withdraw
int do_withdraw(int id)
A special entry point for withdrawing from a nominated discussion item, this only works with the nomination discussion item.

Parameters:
id - the id of the discussion item
Returns:
1 for success, 0 for failure

Protected Functions

These are functions that only objects inheriting the class can access.

add_club_commands
void add_club_commands(object per)
add_elected_commands
void add_elected_commands(object per)
This method adds the elected club specific commands to the player.
